properties.description: Query to combine tables into the Vitals dataset

typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	wildcardPaths:['V500_CLINICAL_EVENT/*']) ~> clinicalevent
source(output(
		
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	wildcardPaths:['raw_mill_prsnl']) ~> prsnl
clinicalevent, prsnl join(ERROR_FUNCTION('') == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> performedprsnl
